data.description:
👋 Welcome to **UPSC STUDY Bot**  

This bot is your free companion for UPSC preparation — from **Prelims to Mains to Interview**. 🚀  

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  
✨ Features  
• 📚 Complete Syllabus Tracker  
• 📰 Weekly Current Affairs + One-Liners  
• 📄 Previous Year Questions (Prelims & Mains)  
• 🧪 Quizs & Weekly Mock Tests  
• 📝 Notes, Answer Writing Practice & Model Answers  
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  
▶️ How to Start?  

Just send /start command or use command from menu

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  
📌 Main Commands  
/start — Start the bot  
/plan — Create 7/30/90 day study plan  
/quiz — Quiz (Topic-wise)  
/pyq — Previous Year Questions    
/current — Weekly Current Affairs + PIB/PRS Highlights  
/mains — Answer writing practice + Model answers  
/help — Support & guide   

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  
💡 Tips  
• Spend at least 25–30 mins daily on Current Affairs + Quiz + Review  
• Take weekly mocks and update your error log  
• Always structure answers in Intro → Body → Conclusion with data/examples  

📣 Extra Resource: For more UPSC content, check 
https://upsc.edumate.life

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  
⚠️ Disclaimer  
This bot is for educational purposes only. Please verify official updates on UPSC’s website.  

Let’s achieve the dream of **UPSC Success — Mission 2028** together! 🏆
